data.name: Smiths & Legends
data.detailed_description:
Will you remain a simple Blacksmith, or go down in history as Legend?

Smiths & Legends is a top-down co-op Blacksmithing RPG. Craft weapons and other recipes within the time limit with your friends while defending your shop from monsters.

Featuring over 60 levels spread across 8 different worlds of blacksmithing craftsmanship (the usual Forest, Desert, Fire, Ice and some other ones!).

Master over 30 different weapon, trade goods and other recipes.

Battle monsters and epic bosses as you protect your shop with some help from your friends.

Each level gives experience based on your performance, to make your party stronger!

With over 20 unique music tracks spread across the worlds.

So what are you waiting for?
What do you mean the furnace isn't done making iron yet?!
